agents.name: Math Agent
agents.description: Performs mathematical calculations including addition, subtraction, multiplication, division, square roots, powers, and percentages. Use for all math calculations.
conversation_starters: A number leaves a remainder of 7 when divided by 23. When multiplied by 5, the result leaves a remainder of 1 when divided by 23. What is the number?
A 5 kg ball is dropped from 50 meters. Air slows it down with a force of 0.2 times its speed. How fast is it falling after 5 seconds?
